response.overview: During a national disaster and lockout period, Daniel and his sick, elderly father were trapped in a one-bedroom apartment. Daniel has to take care of Dad, but the old man is lost in a dream of the mountains and insists on going for a walk. It's impossible. Daniel's courage, their food and his father's oxygen and medicine are almost up. Overwhelmed, Daniel attracts his father for his last hike.
response.title: Die Groensone
